A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is a great entry to the legendary saga. The cast was great. Mark Hamill has one of his best performances as Luke Skywalker. Other highlights include Adam Driver and the late Carrie Fisher. The story was captivating. It takes so many exciting and unexpected turns. I was in awe of Rian Johnson’s directing. The film was also visually stunning. The film does have some flaws. I can’t really explain them without spoiling the film. They are about a certain plot line and something in the ending. Overall\, this is a thrilling film that has me curious and excited for what’s to come.
